name: Resmic
description: Resmic is a Decentralise, Non-Custodial, Peer-to-Peer payment infrastructure aiming to revolutionise the way businesses & individuals transact using cryptocurrencies. At its core, Resmic offers easy integration tools, ensuring 0 downtime and providing cutting-edge payment solutions. It is composed of key features such as Quick links for instantaneous crypto payments, Instant Invoicing, and a unique solution, ProlancePay, which caters specifically to freelancers ensuring trust in transactions.
